articles.title: iSpy Application User Guide
articles.description: This blog provide a handy guide to navigate the Shiny application
articles.contents:
Exploratory Data Analysis
This tab is to identify popular locations of Abila city and identify transaction anomalies.
Users are able to select the categories of locations and time periods that they are interested in from the selection panel located on the top of the page.
